Changelog
=========

1.2 (2013-01-05)
----------------

- The @@validity view now supports *dry-run* mode.
  [zupo]

- The @@validity view now prints processing results to the browser.
  [zupo]


1.1 (2013-01-02)
----------------

- Use ``ipn_`` as a prefix for product group IDs.
  [zupo]


1.0 (2012-12-27)
----------------

- Initial release.
  [zupo]
